website_summaries.verdict: This convenient faucet has a good sprayer with a perfect stream and will automatically shut off after 4 minutes, limiting excess water use.
pros: You can maintain the same temperature through multiple on/off cycles, and the sweeping spray does a good job of rinsing your pans
cons: Sometimes the Solenoid needs to be replaced after extended use

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Reliability- Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this faucet and the sensor didn’t work when we had it installed in March 2019. Paid the plumber to come back twice to replace the electronic control and then the whole unit later. Now, less than a year later, the sensor failed again on the second faucet. It looks like we will be paying a plumber for a third replacement. If you’re looking to put your plumber’s kids through college, buy this faucet. If that’s not how you hoped to spend your hard earned money, I’d strongly recommend that you do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome faucet but at a steep price point.
customer_reviews.text: We just love this faucet. It makes doing dishes so much easier for those like me who wash dishes individually. Saves so much water. Instantly responsive. If you can afford the steep price it’s a wonderful faucet. Just be aware that you’ll need to run A/C power for it. Easiest to tap power from the dishwasher NOT garbage disposal as that’s on a switch. Learn from my mistake. LOL!
customer_reviews.author: RGunn & LGunn

customer_reviews.title: Motion sensing operation is a very desirable feature.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good - functions as designed, easy to install, requires outlet under sink (no battery for motion sensor), be sure to allow enough space directly under faucet to allow free operation of weighted nozzle hose - we typically have faucet set on low (hot) flow (hand washing) and use spray function as desired for normal rinsing of sink items. Highly Recommended quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money due to the poor quality solenoid that Kohler is using. the solenoid is the electronic value that controls water delivery (on/off) via the touchless sensor. This faucet is fantastic when it works, but I have had to replace the solenoid twice in less than 2 years of use. The first one broke within three months. I am currently waiting to receive the second solenoid from Kohler but its is on backorder (because so many of them break?) so until I receive it and get it installed I just have a very expensive manual faucet.
customer_reviews.author: LauraMOM

customer_reviews.title: Great facet!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this kitchen facet for 2 months now. It works perfectly. Installation is simple, but you must follow the directions. One comment, the spray function is extremely strong. When I use it, I get small drops of water all around the sink area from rebounding water. If I use it to rinse off a set of dinner dishes, I have to wipe up the water around the sink with a paper towel. This is both a good thing and a bad thing. The spray is more powerful than my old facet and thus gets more food of the dishes, but I now have to do a little more clean up... after my clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 stars but doesn't work during a power outage
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is gorgeous, and it's pretty easy to install as well as operate! If you want running water if you experience a power outage it's good to connect a tee to an auxiliary faucet off the water source. The wire coming out of the opening is to power it temporarily till I can reroute it under the sink, that hole will be where I put an auxiliary faucet that is connected to a reverse osmosis re-structuring water filter also pictured using a Tee connector at the source.
customer_reviews.author: A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking faucet, however, the touchless feature doesn't work. Koher customer service is only open during the day M-F, so for DIYs who are installing this in the evening/weekend it is hard to get customer service help on the phone when you need it. Replacement parts are on their way as this didn't work out of the box, I'll update when those parts are installed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We had a touch faucet before that did not work well so I was very concerned when my husband decided he wanted a touchless faucet. It has been in for a couple of months and it works great. It has now been 3 years since installation and we have no complaints except when we go to other people’s homes we can’t figure out why their faucet won’t turn on when we wave our hand under it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B.

customer_reviews.title: Clean hands.
customer_reviews.text: Love the hands free feature. This was worth every penny for me and my kitchen. I hate preparing poultry or pork and trying to turn on the sink without getting touching anything with my hands. This changed all of that. Just swipe my hand under the arch and faucet turns on or off. If you leave the water running, it will auto shutoff at 5 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Ker

customer_reviews.title: IT'S NOT RELIABLE OR WORTH THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: WE have had this expensive faucet for 7 weeks and it's not working! It's just my husband and I so...it's not getting used a lot! I'm going to ask for a refund! VERY VERY DISAPPOINTING.
customer_reviews.author: michael french

customer_reviews.title: Love my faucet
customer_reviews.text: Love my faucet. My contractor installed it for me so I can't installation was easy or hard. I love when I am preparing meals and need to use the sink often I don't have to keep turning on the faucet. Family that have come over love it too. It was a little pricey but I would make the purchase again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: TamaraB

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC BUT EXPENSIVE FAUCET
customer_reviews.text: Love the convenience when using faucet. Sprayer is an oval shape, I'd rather it was the normal round type.
customer_reviews.author: Maebird

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves our new faucet
customer_reviews.text: We heard this product has lifetime warranty so we went with this brand. We love that it is touchless and it looks great
customer_reviews.author: Becky H

customer_reviews.title: Like it alot
customer_reviews.text: Like the sensor alot. Had to call Kohler sure to sensor not working outta the box. Amazon restocked this in bad condition so Kohler sent a new one
customer_reviews.author: M. Rech

customer_reviews.title: No touch sensor works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the power is an electrical plug, no batteries. The flat spray shape is more useful than the usual round spray. Easily seen, light on handle signals water pressure is on. This assures hands free operation. Enjoying it more than expected, no negatives!
customer_reviews.author: crasia

customer_reviews.title: Motion activated
customer_reviews.text: I love the motion activated feature, I didn’t realize how convenient it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faucet probably deserves 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Faucet is very nice and works exactly as described. I thought I wanted one that did not revert back to a stream but keep the sprayer option when I turned it back on but now wish it reverted back to a stream. If I have things in the sink and a strong spray come on the water goes everywhere. oh well like and learn. Kohler makes a great product though. I did have a professional plumber install it which was expensive.
customer_reviews.author: LJK

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but great faucet.
customer_reviews.text: Great faucet! Arrived sooner than expected. Faucet is solid very well make and works perfectly. All solid brass and stainless construction with exception to flex hose and electronic components, no cheap plated plastic parts here. Installation was straight forward and instructions easy to follow. Finish appears to be durable and is beautiful. Very happy with purchase. Kohler faucets are not inexpensive but are the best in my humble opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars for this Faucet
customer_reviews.text: We previously used a "competitor's automatic (batteries required) faucet. Sometimes it worked and other times it failed. So, we changed to this (direct-wired) no batteries required, Kohler faucet. While it has been installed only a couple of weeks, we are very satisfied. Furthermore, purchasing it through Amazon saved us a few HUNDRED dollars!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It looks really sleek. My contractor was glad I chose one that can be plugged in instead of buying a version that you needed batteries for the sensors. The stream is perfect and neck is perfect placed.
customer_reviews.author: RSM

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet
customer_reviews.text: Been enjoying this faucet for 24 months now, no problems. Once you have one of these you'll never want to go back to a "regular" faucet.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Touchless feature stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I had this faucet for a month now. It was installed by a professional installer. The faucet worked as described at the beginning , then I have noticed on multiple occasions that the faucet turns on by itself. We have started using it manually, but we didn't pay to have a manual faucet. And not it has stopped working touch-less. You can only use it manually.
customer_reviews.author: Sako

customer_reviews.title: Love the convenience while cooking
customer_reviews.text: Love the convenience while cooking. Works great! Love that it plugs in and is not battery operated. If electricity goes out, just turn off in cabinet and continue to use faucet manually.
customer_reviews.author: cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Faucet
customer_reviews.text: What a big difference-maker this is for updating your kitchen to accommodate frequent cooking. No need to touch anything - on and off from simple hand movement. No drip, no issues. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: OneCardAway

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just make sure you have an 110v outlet
customer_reviews.author: Ron Lingg

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I spent a little extra and got this faucet! Love it every time I use it!
customer_reviews.author: Hena

customer_reviews.title: A great touchless faucet...
customer_reviews.text: This is the most convenient touchless facucet I've installed. The only downside is that steam from something you put in the sink will set off the sensor. Otherwise this faucet works flawless, and is reliable and very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: J. Woznicki

customer_reviews.title: It’s Magical!!!
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is just fantastic. Great to be able to clean your hands without touching anything especially while you’re preparing food!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic faucet!
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest innovation for the kitchen in years! It works beautifully, and I have become so spoiled by the sensor technology that I find myself waving my hand under sinks everywhere else in the house - sadly to no avail. I love my new kitchen faucet. It has proven to be a very worthwhile investment, saving my hands from exposure to water in many ways.
customer_reviews.author: MBO

customer_reviews.title: Hands-free operation is perfect when prepping messy items or meats where you want ...
customer_reviews.text: Hands-free operation is perfect when prepping messy items or meats where you want to avoid contamination by caused by touching things. The only con is steam, from emptying boiled water, will cause it to turn on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and really keeps cross contamination easy to avoid
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient and really keeps cross contamination easy to avoid. The only negative is I keep waving my hand under other sinks and it takes me a second to realize they aren't motion sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Touchless is GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful faucet. You have to get used to the increased potential for 'splashing' that occurs due to it's tall nature. The stream/sprayer stays where you last used it. The touchless function is extremely convenient.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: My new Kohler faucet.
customer_reviews.text: The faucet was delivered as planned and in perfect condition. There were no problems with the installation and it looks very sleek on my counter top. I was very pleased to find that I was able to purchase for at least $100 less through Amazon! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: June Yozzo

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: ordered faucet as an open box .a part was missing that cost 65 dollars to replace ,was credited asap and faucet works awesome and got a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Power

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly and is a great water saving​ convenience.
customer_reviews.author: james mercado

customer_reviews.title: I think installation was pretty involved, as it needs an electricity source
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive faucet. I am still getting used to the touchless aspect and have turned it on/off accidentally a few times, but so far it is very convenient. I think installation was pretty involved, as it needs an electricity source.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it so much we want to bring it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and installed our Kohler Sensate Faucet in March, 2014 and it still works perfectly. We love it so much we want to bring it to our new house when we move!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Bee

customer_reviews.title: Generally excellent, except the aerator...
customer_reviews.text: This faucet works great. Was nervous about the Touchless operation, but it works flawlessly and not erratic at all. I was nervous about it going on and off by just touching or repositioning the handle... but you have to place your hand in the exact spot to turn the water on and off so it works wonderfully well and the Touchless on/off is very predictable. My only complaint is that aerator is not very smooth so we get a lot of water splashing in the sink. The aerator cannot be removed or changed for a better one, as it's all built in with the handle. For the price, I would expect every aspect to work flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph  Spada

customer_reviews.title: Sensor malfunction
customer_reviews.text: Just had it for two weeks and sensor is not working already
customer_reviews.author: afsheen

customer_reviews.title: This faucet is awesome. The Sensate feature is great
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is awesome. The Sensate feature is great. The material doesn't seem to show hand prints, which is great. I'd definitely buy this faucet for my next house!
customer_reviews.author: Dominic L.

customer_reviews.title: Touchless faucet
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a Kohler Short apron farm sink and liked the quality. Shopping for a faucet I liked the looks of this faucet, it was not the top rater sensor faucet on some report, the report had issues with Kohler sensor, Kohler said the problem was fixed. The top rated model by the review had many bad reviews. Even with the higher Kohler's price I purchased this product. The faucet seems to be well made,was easy to install, all the functions are working properly. The sprayer has some serious power with a wide spray pattern, So far one week we love it.
customer_reviews.author: JoeLucas

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. Note that steam fools it
customer_reviews.text: 2-1/2 months after install... overall, so far so good. Note that steam fools it, placing a dark pan in the stainless steel sink fools it too. Another brand at my friend's sink turns off automatically after 3 minutes when no one is in proximity. I wish this one did. I gave it a high 4 because it does what I bought it for which is touch-free on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick of Concord

customer_reviews.title: Solid faucet
customer_reviews.text: Looks & works great! Sprayer works really well too. What I do not like is when you lose power, water does not come out of faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Dan DaSilva

customer_reviews.title: Get it now and you'll never regret it...
customer_reviews.text: Great faucet. Good sprayer and works well. In power outage you lose use, but its electronic.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Litman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Flawless so far...really helps asnitation in kitchen when things get messy! Installation was simple...solid construction. Brushed stainless finish looks good, spray option works well and faucet looks good on a farmers sink
customer_reviews.author: Sailmon56

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, don't know why we didn't get it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this faucet
customer_reviews.text: I love this faucet, why did I wait so long to buy it. This is the best improvement I've done to our kitchen in years. It works better than I could've ever expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! N
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Works beautifully. I was concerned about the look being too chunky and it's not. It's simple and has very clean lines. It's a big hit in my new kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Sensate Touchless Faucet
customer_reviews.text: Had an initial problem with the faucet not shutting completely off. Went through the included troubleshooting guide to no avail. Contacted Customer Service at Kohler and received excellent assistance in resolving the issue. We love the touchless feature. Installed 3 weeks ago and so far we are thoroughly pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Skydiverdriver

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life???
customer_reviews.text: If you can afford to spend the money on this...BUY IT NOW!!! It looks great, works great and I can't imagine not having this faucet!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy G

customer_reviews.title: Great Faucet
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but works very well. I quickly developed a habit of waving my hand at the faucet instead of reaching for a knob. It was too complicated for me to install myself so it was professionally installed.
customer_reviews.author: Ted T

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Faucet
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have purchased it sooner! I highly recommend it. This makes me now want to re-do my entire kitchen....which I'm contemplating doing.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: We love this facet
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow! We love this facet....how did we live so long with out touches facets.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R. Apodaca

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that would make this better would be motion on top and bottom as long ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that would make this better would be motion on top and bottom as long as it wasn't visible. I thought this had both when ordering. Love this faucet!
customer_reviews.author: BMW

customer_reviews.title: unit is good but I find better deals outside of Amazon
customer_reviews.text: nice unit works just like they claim I wouldn't buy the unit from this vendor or amazon I need another units and found better deals outside of Amazon so look around, normally amazon has the best price but not on this unit I saved $50.00 shopping around
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: love this faucet!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality from kohler. I have had this sink for several months and no problems at all. The sensing mechanism always works.
customer_reviews.author: Lianne

product_meta.title: KOHLER K-72218-VS Sensate Touchless Kitchen Faucet, Vibrant Stainless
product_meta.description:
Style:Standard Touchless| Color:Vibrant StainlessTake touchless to a whole new level of convenience. The Sensate touchless faucet frees your hands so you can speed through cooking and cleanup tasks while enjoying a cleaner, more hygienic kitchen environment. Sensate's intuitive Response(TM) technology is in tune with your every move: a simple wave of your hand or an object such as a pan or utensil turns it on or off. The faucet's sensor is precision designed to provide reliable operation every time and to prevent false activations when you're working in the sink area. DockNetik(TM), KOHLER's new docking system, secures the pull down sprayhead to the spout using magnetic force.

AMAZON.COM


view larger view larger view larger view larger view larger view larger CONVENIENCE IN TECHNOLOGY
The Response technology of the Sensate touchless kitchen faucet responds to your movements, leaving you to wonder how you ever prepped, cleaned and cooked without it. Tackling daily kitchen tasks often leaves your hands messy, full or even both. KOHLER has simplified and streamlined the kitchen faucet to make your time in the kitchen more efficient. Delivering convenient and hygienic control, this intuitive faucet reduces the threat of cross-contamination. Sensate has many convenient features such as an automatic shutoff safeguard to make cleanup easier. 

KEEP YOUR KITCHEN CLEANER
The Sensate kitchen faucet frees your hands so that you can flow through your kitchen tasks, like messy food prep, without pausing to turn the faucet handle on and off. And you don’t have to worry about spreading the mess and germs to the rest of the kitchen. 

The state-of-art sensor responds in 20 milliseconds. Simple wave your hand or a pot or pan through the sensor window for reliable on/off operation. The window begins at the underside of the spout and extends six inches toward the base. Simply wave your hand through the beam to activate the water. If you need to change the water temperature, simply adjust the handle while the faucet is in use. 

SPRAYHEAD FEATURES
Sensate features DockNetik, our new magnetic docking system that securely locks the sprayhead in place. With spray and stream capabilities, the dual-function sprayhead makes tough kitchen tasks light work. The braided nylon hose prevents kinks and tangles, and the swiveling ball joint ensures smooth operation with minimal effort. 

DESIGNED FOR BEAUTY AND POWER
The fusion of sleek design and workhorse functionality allows you to accomplish kitchen tasks more cleanly and easily. Sensate's signature aesthetic element is the black bonnet - an unexpected touch that adds a subtle detail to its design. A finished-matched bonnet is also available. The strategically placed activation area makes use precise and natural. An LED light near the base of the faucet alerts you that the Sensate is operational and ready to go. And in the event of a power loss, the faucet can be operated manually. 

KEY FEATURES
 * Touchless Operation: convenient and hygienic control with Response technology 
 * State-of-Art Sensor: responds to motion in 20 milliseconds
 * Battery-Free: AC power means no batteries to replace 
 * Secure Magnetic Docking: sprayhead securely locks in place 
 * Lasting Finish: resists corrosion and wear 
 * Durable Ceramic Valves: a lifetime of exceptional performance
 * Easy Clean: wipes clean with a wet cloth
 * Auto Shutoff: automatic shutoff safeguard
 * ProMotion Technology: connects the sprayhead hose to the sprayhead with a swivel joint for effortless maneuverability
 * MasterClean Sprayface: flexible nozzles for an easy-to-clean surface that resists mineral buildup and wipes clean with a wet cloth



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Take touchless to a whole new level of convenience. The Sensate touchless faucet frees your hands so you can speed through cooking and cleanup tasks while enjoying a cleaner, more hygienic kitchen environment. Sensate's intuitive Response(TM) technology is in tune with your every move: a simple wave of your hand--or an object such as a pan or utensil--turns it on or off. The faucet's sensor is precision-designed to provide reliable operation every time and to prevent false activations when you're working in the sink area. DockNetik(TM), KOHLER's new docking system, secures the pull-down sprayhead to the spout using magnetic force.

See more
feature_bullets: Docknetik is a Magnetic docking system located within the spout, smoothly glides and securely locks the spray head into place
Promotion technology's light quiet nylon hose and ball joint make the pull down spray head easier and more comfortable to use
Master clean spray face features an easy to clean surface that withstands mineral buildup
Response technology provides reliable touchless on/off operation through a state of the art sensor that responds in 20 milliseconds
Precision activation window helps prevent false activations

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars142 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
